original_text: When the believers in Antioch read the letter, they were very happy. They said, ‘This message will help us very much.’

sentences.original_text: When the believers in Antioch read the letter
sentences.korean_translation: 안디옥에 있는 신자들이 그 편지를 읽었을 때

sentences.original_text: This message will help us very much
sentences.korean_translation: 이 메시지는 우리를 많이 도와줄 것이다
